recipesJson.name: Live Mixing: The Heat
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is an ICEY Melon Pineapple mix with some light passionfruit and citrus. 

Made on "LIVE MIXING: THE HEAT"
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qbs1vQnHnuo

reviews.text:
Hoping TFA Honeydew will be ok.  Cant wait to try this.  Thanks again for a great recipe.
-Update, off the shake it is great. Honey dew over powering a little, but great.  Thanks again
